data.actual_result: i can send files in NSFW channel before accepting that im 18+
data.expected_result: i shouldn't be able to send files in a NSFW channel without accepting that im 18+
data.short_description: you can access the upload modal and send files in NSFW channels where you haven't accepted the +18 warning yet
data.steps_to_repro: - create a NSFW channel - go to the channel and don't interact with the warning - drag a Discord meme from your desktop and drop it in that channel - send it and observe
